Just to be blatantly clear for people, this is what I had to do to get this to work:

1. Download this torrent.
2. Run the setup.
3. Go into the game directory you installed it to, usually Steam/Steamapps/common/Sang-Froid Tales of Werewolves.
4. Go into the 'Install' folder and run 'SangFroidSetup.exe'.
5. Copy the contents of the NoDVD folder over to the main game directory and overwrite. 
6. Play. 

If it still doesn't work, then download the fix HeroMaster posted and put it in your game directory. If it *still* doesn't work, copy the contents of the included 'Steam' folder into your Program Files x86Steam directory. Do not overwrite anything.
